title: The Herd-HOUR-1-NBA, LeBron James
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR-1-NBA, LeBron James
description:
Colin talks about players deciding to continue the NBA playoffs, what we ask from our athletes, and LeBron James changing his mind.

Guest: Chris Broussard

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
